name: Chapati with Dal
ingredients: Wheat flour (100g), Water, Salt, Arhar dal (50g), Turmeric, Ghee
instructions:
Knead 2 cups wheat flour with salt and water to form soft dough; rest 15 minutes.

Cook 1 cup toor dal with 1/4 tsp turmeric and salt till soft.

Heat 1 tbsp ghee; add 1 tsp mustard seeds, curry leaves, and dried red chili for tempering. Pour over dal.

Roll chapatis and cook on hot tava until brown spots appear on both sides.

Serve chapatis hot with the dal.

name: Paneer Tikka
ingredients: Paneer (200g), Yogurt, Ginger-garlic paste, Tandoori masala, Lemon juice, Bell peppers, Onion
instructions: 1. Cut paneer into cubes. 2. Marinate with yogurt, spices, lemon juice for 30 mins. 3. Skewer with bell peppers and onion. 4. Grill till golden. Serve hot.

name: Rajma Chawal
ingredients: Red kidney beans (100g), Rice (100g), Onion, Tomato, Ginger-garlic paste, Cumin, Coriander powder, Garam masala
instructions: 1. Soak rajma overnight, pressure cook till soft. 2. Prepare tadka with cumin, onion, tomato, spices. 3. Add cooked rajma, simmer. 4. Cook rice separately. Serve together.

name: Aloo Gobi
ingredients: Potato (200g), Cauliflower (200g), Turmeric, Cumin, Coriander powder, Garam masala, Oil
instructions:
Cut 2 medium potatoes and 1 medium cauliflower into medium pieces.

Heat 2 tbsp oil in pan; add 1 tsp cumin seeds until they splutter.

Add 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp coriander powder, 1 tsp red chili powder, and salt to taste.

Add chopped potatoes and cauliflower, mix well.

Cover and cook on low-medium heat 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally.

Garnish with fresh coriander and serve hot.

name: Palak Paneer
ingredients: Spinach (250g), Paneer (150g), Onion, Tomato, Cream, Ginger-garlic paste, Spices
instructions: 1. Blanch spinach, make puree. 2. Saute onion, tomato, spices. 3. Add spinach puree, simmer. 4. Add paneer cubes and cream. Serve with roti.

name: Chole Bhature
ingredients: Chickpeas (100g), Flour (150g), Yogurt, Onion, Tomato, Chole masala, Oil
instructions:
Soak 1 cup chickpeas overnight; pressure cook till soft.

Sauté 2 chopped onions and 2 crushed tomatoes with chole masala, turmeric, coriander powder, and salt.

Add cooked chickpeas, simmer for 20 mins.

Prepare bhature dough using 2 cups all-purpose flour, yogurt, salt, and water; rest 2 hours.

Roll into circles and deep fry till puffed and golden.

Serve hot bhature with chole.

name: Veg Biryani
ingredients: Basmati rice (100g), Mixed vegetables (200g), Yogurt, Biryani masala, Fried onions, Mint
instructions:
2 cup basmati rice wash kar ke 30 mins ke liye bhigo dein.

2 tbsp ghee mein 1 bay leaf, 2 tej patta, 2 elaichi, 1 dalchini, 4 cloves daal kar bhuno.

1 chopped onion, 1 tbsp ginger-garlic paste add karein, translucent hone tak bhuno.

1/2 cup chopped mixed vegetables (gajar, phoolgobhi, matar), 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp garam masala, salt.

1/4 cup yogurt dalein; mix karen.

1.5 cup paani dalein, rice add karein, aur 70% pakne tak cook karen.

Rice ko layers mein rakhkar dum pe rakh dein 20 mins ke liye.

Garama garam serve karein.

name: Masala Dosa
ingredients: Rice (100g), Urad dal (50g), Potato (150g), Onion, Mustard seeds, Curry leaves, Turmeric
instructions:
Soak 2 cups rice and 1/2 cup urad dal; grind and ferment overnight.

Prepare spiced potato filling by sautéing boiled potatoes with mustard seeds, turmeric, chilies, and curry leaves.

Spread dosa batter thin on hot tava; add filling and fold.

Serve with sambhar and coconut chutney.

name: Idli Sambhar
ingredients: Rice (100g), Urad dal (50g), Arhar dal (40g), Vegetables, Tamarind, Sambhar masala
instructions:
Soak 1 cup rice and 1/2 cup urad dal separately overnight; grind and ferment batter 8-10 hours.

Pour batter into greased idli molds; steam for 10-15 minutes.

Prepare sambhar with cooked toor dal, tamarind extract, mixed vegetables, and sambhar powder.

Serve idlis hot with sambhar and coconut chutney.

name: Vegetable Pulao
ingredients: Basmati rice (100g), Mixed vegetables (150g), Ghee, Whole spices (bay leaf, cinnamon, cardamom), Salt
instructions:
Rinse 1 cup basmati rice; soak 20 mins.

Heat 2 tbsp oil; add whole spices (bay leaf, cinnamon, cardamom).

Add chopped vegetables (carrots, beans, peas). Sauté 5 mins.

Add rice, salt, water (1.5 cups). Cook covered till rice done.

Garnish with fried onions and mint.

name: Aloo Paratha
ingredients: Various vegetables, spices, flour/rice as needed
instructions:
Boil 3 medium potatoes, peel and mash.

Add 2 chopped green chilies, 1/4 cup chopped coriander, 1 tsp garam masala, and salt to taste. Mix well.

Prepare wheat dough with 2 cups wheat flour, water, and pinch of salt; rest 10 minutes.

Divide dough into balls, stuff with potato mixture, roll into flat circles.

Cook paratha on hot tava with ghee/butter on both sides till golden.

Serve hot with yogurt or pickle.

name: Paneer Butter Masala
ingredients: Various vegetables, spices, flour/rice as needed
instructions:
Heat 2 tbsp butter and 1 tbsp oil in a pan.

Sauté 1 large finely chopped onion until golden brown.

Add 1 tbsp ginger-garlic paste and cook for 2 minutes.

Add 1 cup tomato puree, 1/2 tsp turmeric powder, 1 tsp coriander powder, 1 tsp red chili powder, and salt to taste. Cook until oil separates.

Add 200g paneer cubes and mix gently.

Stir in 1/4 cup fresh cream and simmer for 5 minutes.

Garnish with fenugreek leaves (kasuri methi) and serve hot with naan or rice.

name: Veg Korma
ingredients: Various vegetables, spices, flour/rice as needed
instructions:
2 cup mixed vegetables (gajar, matar, gobhi, beans) ko wash karein.

2 tbsp oil ya ghee mein 1 tsp jeera, 1 bay leaf, 1 elaichi, 1 inch adrak, 2-3 laal mirch, 1/2 tsp haldi daal kar bhuno.

1 chopped piyaz aur 1/2 cup dahi, 1 tsp garam masala, 1 tsp dhania powder, namak daal kar bhuno.

Sabziyon ki bhuni hui mixture dal kar 10-15 mins dhimi aanch pe pakne dein.

Garnish with fresh coriander.

Serve hot with chapati or rice.

name: Bhindi Masala
ingredients: Various vegetables, spices, flour/rice as needed
instructions:
Wash and chop 250g okra (bhindi) into 1-inch pieces. Sprinkle 1 tsp salt; set aside 10 mins.

Heat 2 tbsp oil in pan, add 1 tsp mustard seeds, 1/4 tsp asafoetida.

Add 1 chopped onion, sauté until golden.

Add 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp coriander powder, 1 tsp red chili powder, and salt to taste.

Add bhindi, mix well, cover and cook on low heat 15-20 mins till tender and slightly crisp.

Garnish with chopped coriander.

name: Mix Veg Curry
ingredients: Various vegetables, spices, flour/rice as needed
instructions:
Heat oil; sauté 1 chopped onion till translucent.

Add 1 tbsp ginger-garlic paste; cook 2 mins.

Add chopped tomatoes, turmeric, coriander powder, chili powder, and salt.

Add mixed vegetables (carrots, beans, peas, cauliflower) and cook 15-20 mins till tender.

Garnish with fresh coriander leaves.

name: Methi Thepla
ingredients: Various vegetables, spices, flour/rice as needed
instructions:
Mix 2 cups wheat flour with 1 cup chopped fresh fenugreek leaves, 1 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp chili powder, and salt to taste.

Add yogurt and water to form a soft dough; rest 15 mins.

Roll into thin rotis and cook on hot pan with a little oil until golden.

Serve hot with yogurt or pickle.

name: Poha
ingredients: Various vegetables, spices, flour/rice as needed
instructions:
Rinse 2 cups flattened rice (poha) in cold water and drain well.

Heat 2 tbsp oil in a pan; add 1 tsp mustard seeds, 1/2 tsp cumin seeds, a few curry leaves, and 2 chopped green chilies. Sauté for a minute.

Add 1 chopped onion and sauté till translucent.

Add 1/4 teaspoon turmeric powder, salt, and 1 teaspoon sugar; mix well.

Add soaked poha and gently stir to coat with turmeric and spices.

Cook on low heat for 4-5 minutes, stirring occasionally.

Garnish with chopped coriander and squeeze lemon juice over before serving.

name: Upma
ingredients: Various vegetables, spices, flour/rice as needed
instructions:
Dry roast 1 cup semolina (rava) in a pan till light golden; set aside.

Heat 2 tbsp oil in the same pan; add 1 tsp mustard seeds, 1 tsp urad dal, 1 tsp chana dal, curry leaves, and 1-2 green chilies chopped. Sauté till aromatic.

Add 1 chopped onion and sauté till translucent.

Pour 3 cups boiling water into the pan; add salt to taste.

Slowly add roasted semolina while stirring continuously to avoid lumps.

Cook on medium heat till water is absorbed and upma thickens, stirring occasionally.

Garnish with chopped coriander leaves and serve hot.

name: Dhokla
ingredients: Various vegetables, spices, flour/rice as needed
instructions:
Mix 1 cup gram flour, 1 cup water, 1 tsp sugar, and salt to taste; let batter rest.

Add 1 tsp lemon juice and 1 tsp Eno fruit salt just before steaming; mix gently.

Steam in greased container for 15-20 mins.

Heat 1 tbsp oil; add 1 tsp mustard seeds and curry leaves, pour tempering over dhokla.

Garnish with chopped coriander.

name: Khandvi
ingredients: Various vegetables, spices, flour/rice as needed
instructions:
Whisk 1 cup gram flour with 1 cup yogurt, salt, and 1/2 tsp turmeric.

Cook mixture on medium heat, stirring till thick and smooth.

Spread thin layer on greased surface, cool, and cut into strips.

Roll strips, garnish with mustard seeds, sesame seeds, and grated coconut.

Serve chilled or room temperature.

instructions: 1. Marinate chicken in yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, spices, lemon juice 30 mins. 2. Skewer and grill till cooked. 3. Serve with mint chutney.

name: Egg Bhurji with Paratha
ingredients: Eggs (2), Onion, Tomato, Green chili, Turmeric, Red chili powder, Wheat flour for paratha
instructions:
1.Break eggs into a bowl. Add two large pinch of salt. Using a fork beat well.
2.Heat oil in a skillet. Add finely chopped onion. Saute for 3-4 minutes until it is softened. Keep stirring to prevent it from sticking.3
Add chopped green chilies, chopped ginger, and tomatoes4.
Cook until tomatoes are softened. Smash the mixture with the back of the spoon to bring together the onion and tomato mixture. It will take around 4-5 minutes.
Add turmeric powder, chilli powder, pav bhaji masala, and salt. Mix well and cook for 1-2 minutes on low flame.
Sprinkle a bit of water if the onion mixture sticks to the bottom of the pan.
Add in beaten egg. let it cook unrest for 30 seconds. Then using a spatula mix in the egg with the onion-tomato mixture. Keep breaking any big lumps of egg mixture.
Switch off the flame when the egg is just done. Eggs will continue to cook even after you take off the pan from heat.

name: Chicken Curry & Rice
ingredients: Chicken (200g), Rice (100g), Onion, Tomato, Coconut milk, Curry spices
instructions:
Marinate chicken pieces with lemon juice and salt, keep in refrigerator for 10 minutes.

Blend garlic, ginger, cumin, ground coriander, garam masala, chili powder, paprika and yogurt. Coat chicken cubes with this mixture. Add oil, mix well, and marinate for at least 30 minutes or overnight for best results.

Grill or pan-cook chicken pieces until tender.

Heat oil in a large pan. Add onions and sautÃ© until lightly browned. Add ginger and sautÃ© until fragrant.

Add turmeric, ground coriander, paprika, and chili powderâsautÃ© for a minute.

Add tomato puree and chopped tomatoes. SautÃ© until the tomatoes are soft and the sauce thickens.

Add lemon juice and cream. Add water if needed for desired sauce consistency. Cook for 3-4 minutes.

Season with salt, garam masala, and coriander leaves. Stir in the grilled chicken. Cook everything together until chicken is soft.

Garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot with naan or rice.â

name: Fish Fry
ingredients: Fish fillets (200g), Turmeric, Red chili powder, Lemon juice, Rice flour, Oil for frying
instructions: 1. Marinate fish with turmeric, chili powder, lemon juice. 2. Coat with rice flour. 3. Shallow fry till golden. Serve hot.

name: Mutton Rogan Josh
ingredients: Mutton (250g), Yogurt, Onion, Kashmiri chili, Ginger-garlic paste, Whole spices, Oil
instructions:
Wash and drain mutton pieces well. Marinate with lemon juice, salt, ginger powder, fennel powder, cardamom powder, black pepper, and curd for 2â4 hours.

In a heavy pan, heat mustard oil/ghee. Add bay leaves, cinnamon, green and black cardamoms, cloves, and sautÃ© for 30 seconds.

Add asafoetida, then add marinated mutton. Fry on high heat for about 4 minutes.

Add Kashmiri red chili powder. Stir quickly and add a splash of water to prevent burning.

Mix the remaining yogurt with some water and pour into the pan, stir well.

Add more water as needed, cover and simmer on low heat until mutton is cooked and tender (about 45â75 minutes on stove or 20 minutes in pressure cooker).

For extra flavor and color, infuse ratan jot in hot ghee for a minute, then strain and pour the ghee over the curry.

Taste for salt and adjust. Serve hot with steamed rice or naan.

name: Chicken Biryani
ingredients: Chicken (200g), Basmati rice (100g), Yogurt, Biryani masala, Fried onions, Mint, Saffron
instructions:
Marinate 500g chicken with 1 cup yogurt, 1 tbsp ginger-garlic paste, 1 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp red chili powder, 1 tbsp garam masala, and salt. Keep for 1 hour.

Parboil 2 cups basmati rice till 70% cooked.

In heavy pan, sauté onions in oil till golden brown; add marinated chicken and cook till tender.

Layer cooked rice over chicken, add saffron soaked in warm milk and 2 tbsp ghee.

Cover tightly and cook on low heat (dum) for 25-30 minutes.

Garnish with fried onions and chopped coriander. Serve hot with raita.

name: Prawn Curry
ingredients: Prawns (200g), Coconut milk, Onion, Tomato, Curry leaves, Tamarind, Spices
instructions: 1. Clean prawns. 2. Prepare curry with coconut milk, onion, tomato, spices. 3. Add prawns, cook till done. Serve with rice.

name: Tandoori Chicken
ingredients: Chicken (250g), Yogurt, Tandoori masala, Kashmiri chili, Lemon juice, Ginger-garlic paste
instructions: 1. Marinate chicken with yogurt, tandoori masala, spices for 2 hours. 2. Grill or bake till charred and cooked. Serve hot.

ingredients: Eggs (2), Onion, Tomato, Ginger-garlic paste, Garam masala, Turmeric, Oil
instructions: 1. Boil and peel eggs. 2. Prepare curry gravy with onion, tomato, spices. 3. Add eggs, simmer. Serve with rice or roti.

instructions:
Sauté 1 large chopped onion and 1 tbsp ginger-garlic paste in 2 tbsp ghee till golden.

instructions: 1. Chop fruits. 2. Mix with peanuts, chaat masala, lemon juice. Serve fresh.

ingredients: Oats (100g), Onion, Tomato, Green chili, Coriander, Turmeric, Salt
instructions: 1. Grind oats, mix with chopped vegetables and spices. 2. Spread on tawa, cook both sides. Serve hot.

ingredients: Quinoa (100g), Cucumber, Tomato, Bell pepper, Lemon juice, Olive oil, Salt
instructions: 1. Cook quinoa till fluffy. 2. Mix with chopped vegetables, lemon juice, olive oil. Serve chilled.

name: Vegan Curry
ingredients: Chickpeas (100g), Coconut milk, Onion, Tomato, Curry powder, Garlic, Ginger
instructions:
Heat 2 tbsp oil; sauté 1 chopped onion, 2 tomatoes, 1 tsp cumin, turmeric, chili powder.

Add 1 cup mixed vegetables and 1/2 cup chickpeas or lentils.

Pour 1 cup coconut milk; simmer till vegetables tender.

Garnish with coriander leaves.

Serve hot with rice or bread.

name: Smoothie Bowl
ingredients: Banana, Berries, Almond milk, Chia seeds, Granola
instructions: 1. Blend banana, berries, almond milk. 2. Pour in bowl, top with chia seeds, granola. Serve cold.

name: Lentil Soup
ingredients: Red lentils (100g), Carrot, Celery, Onion, Vegetable stock, Cumin, Turmeric
instructions: 1. Saute vegetables. 2. Add lentils, stock, spices. 3. Cook till lentils are soft. Blend if desired. Serve hot.

name: Tofu Stir Fry
ingredients: Tofu (150g), Bell peppers, Broccoli, Soy sauce, Garlic, Ginger, Sesame oil
instructions: 1. Cut tofu, vegetables. 2. Stir fry in sesame oil with garlic, ginger. 3. Add soy sauce. Serve with rice or noodles.

name: Chia Pudding
ingredients: Chia seeds (30g), Almond milk, Maple syrup, Vanilla extract, Berries for topping
instructions: 1. Mix chia seeds with almond milk, maple syrup, vanilla. 2. Refrigerate overnight. 3. Top with berries before serving.

name: Vegan Burger
ingredients: Black bean patty, Burger bun, Lettuce, Tomato, Onion, Vegan mayo, Pickles
instructions:
Mash 1 cup cooked beans (chickpeas or black beans).

Add 1/4 cup oats, 1 chopped onion, 1 tsp cumin powder, garlic powder, salt, pepper.

Form into patties.

Grill or fry till golden on both sides.

Serve with lettuce, tomato, vegan mayonnaise inside buns.

name: Hummus Bowl
ingredients: Plant-based ingredients, vegetables, grains as needed
instructions:
Blend 1 cup cooked chickpeas, 2 tbsp tahini, 1 clove garlic, juice of 1 lemon, and salt to taste in food processor until smooth.

Drizzle with olive oil, sprinkle paprika and chopped parsley.

Serve with sliced cucumbers, carrots, and pita bread.

name: Vegan Tacos
ingredients: Plant-based ingredients, vegetables, grains as needed
instructions:
Fill whole wheat tortillas with spiced black beans, chopped lettuce, tomato, onion, and avocado.

Add vegan salsa and vegan sour cream.

Fold and serve.

name: Buddha Bowl
ingredients: Plant-based ingredients, vegetables, grains as needed
instructions:
Cook 1 cup quinoa or brown rice as the base; keep warm.

Roast or steam assorted vegetables like sweet potatoes (cut into cubes), broccoli florets, and chickpeas until tender.

Prepare a dressing using 2 tbsp tahini, 1 tbsp lemon juice, 1 tsp maple syrup or honey, and salt to taste. Mix well.

In a bowl, arrange the cooked quinoa or rice, roasted vegetables, and chickpeas in separate sections.

Drizzle the dressing over the bowl evenly.

Garnish with sliced avocado, pumpkin seeds, and fresh herbs like parsley or cilantro.

Serve fresh, either warm or at room temperature.

name: Green Smoothie
ingredients: Plant-based ingredients, vegetables, grains as needed
instructions:
Blend 1 cup fresh spinach, 1 banana, 1/2 cup plain yogurt, 1 tsp honey, and 1/2 cup water until smooth.

Pour into glass, serve chilled.

name: Vegan Pizza
ingredients: Plant-based ingredients, vegetables, grains as needed
instructions:
Prepare the crust: Mix 1.5 cups almond flour, 1/4 cup tapioca flour, 1/4 tsp salt, 1/2 tsp baking powder, 2 tbsp olive oil, and 1/4 cup water. Knead into a soft dough.

Roll the dough into a circle on parchment paper to desired thickness.

Bake in preheated oven at 180°C (350°F) for 10-12 minutes until lightly golden.

Prepare toppings: Use tomato sauce, sliced vegetables (bell peppers, onions, mushrooms, olives), and vegan cheese.

Spread the tomato sauce over the baked crust.

Add vegetables and sprinkle vegan cheese on top.

Bake again at 180°C (350°F) for 10 minutes until cheese melts.

Garnish with fresh herbs (basil or oregano).

Slice and serve hot.

name: Falafel
ingredients: Plant-based ingredients, vegetables, grains as needed
instructions:
Soak 1 cup chickpeas overnight, grind to coarse paste with onion, garlic, coriander, cumin, salt, and pepper.

Shape into small balls.

Deep fry in hot oil till golden brown.

Serve with tahini sauce or pita bread.

name: Vegan Pasta
ingredients: Plant-based ingredients, vegetables, grains as needed
instructions:
Cook 150g pasta till al dente; set aside.

Stir fry mixed veggies (bell peppers, zucchini, carrots) in 2 tbsp olive oil.

Add cooked pasta, 1/4 cup tomato sauce, basil, oregano.

Mix well; cook 2 mins.

Serve hot with vegan cheese topping.

name: Vegetable Soup
ingredients: Plant-based ingredients, vegetables, grains as needed
instructions:
Chop vegetables (carrots, beans, potato, spinach).

Boil in 4 cups water with salt, pepper, and herbs till tender.

Puree partially if desired, or serve chunky.

Garnish with coriander and lemon.

name: Avocado Toast
ingredients: Plant-based ingredients, vegetables, grains as needed
instructions:

name: Avocado Keto Bowl
ingredients: Avocado, Egg (boiled), Mixed greens, Olive oil, Salt, Pepper
instructions:
Cube 1 ripe avocado.

Toss with 1 cup fresh spinach, 1/4 cup walnuts, and 1 tbsp chia seeds.

Drizzle with 1 tbsp olive oil and 1 tbsp lemon juice.

Mix gently and serve fresh.

name: Keto Chicken Salad
ingredients: Grilled chicken (150g), Lettuce, Cucumber, Avocado, Olive oil, Lemon juice
instructions: 1. Grill chicken, slice. 2. Mix with lettuce, cucumber, avocado. 3. Dress with olive oil and lemon. Serve fresh.

name: Egg Muffins
ingredients: Eggs (3), Bell peppers, Onion, Cheese, Salt, Pepper
instructions: 1. Whisk eggs with chopped vegetables, cheese. 2. Pour in muffin tins. 3. Bake at 180Â°C for 20 mins. Serve warm.

name: Keto Butter Coffee
ingredients: Coffee (black), Butter (1 tbsp), MCT oil (1 tbsp)
instructions:
Brew 1 cup strong coffee.

Blend coffee with 1 tbsp unsalted butter and 1 tbsp coconut oil till frothy and creamy.

Serve hot.

name: Cauliflower Rice
ingredients: Cauliflower (200g), Garlic, Olive oil, Salt, Pepper
instructions:
Cut 1 medium head of cauliflower into florets.

Pulse the florets in a food processor until they resemble rice grains (do in batches if needed).

Heat 2 tbsp oil or butter in a pan over medium heat.

Add 1 tsp cumin seeds and sauté until fragrant.

Add the processed cauliflower rice, season with salt and pepper to taste.

Cook, stirring occasionally, for 5-7 minutes until the cauliflower is tender but not mushy.

Optional: Add chopped herbs like cilantro or parsley and a squeeze of lemon juice before serving.

name: Zucchini odles
ingredients: Zucchini (2), Olive oil, Garlic, Cherry tomatoes, Basil, Parmesan
instructions: 1. Spiralize zucchini into noodles. 2. Saute with garlic, tomatoes, basil. 3. Top with parmesan. Serve hot.

name: Keto Fat Bombs
ingredients: Cream cheese, Butter, Cocoa powder, Stevia, Vanilla extract
instructions:
Melt 1/2 cup coconut oil and 1/4 cup cream cheese.

Mix with 2 tbsp sweetener and 1 tsp vanilla essence.

Pour into silicone molds.

Chill until firm.

Store in refrigerator.

name: Grilled Salmon
ingredients: Salmon fillet (150g), Lemon, Olive oil, Dill, Garlic, Salt, Pepper
instructions:
Marinate 2 salmon fillets with salt, pepper, and lemon juice for 15 minutes.

Preheat grill or pan.

Cook salmon skin-side down for 4-5 minutes, flip and cook another 3-4 minutes till flakes easily.

Serve hot with steamed vegetables or salad.

name: Keto Smoothie
ingredients: Avocado, Spinach, Coconut milk, Almond butter, Stevia
instructions:
Blend 1 cup spinach, 1/2 avocado, 1 cup unsweetened almond milk, and 1 scoop protein powder till smooth.

Serve chilled.

name: Cheese Omelette
ingredients: Eggs (2), Cheese, Butter, Mushrooms, Spinach, Salt, Pepper

Wrap each spear with 1 slice bacon.

Bake at 400°F (200°C) on a tray for 15-20 minutes until bacon is crispy.

Serve warm as appetizer.

name: Veg Biryani
ingredients: Basmati rice (100g), Mixed vegetables (200g), Yogurt, Biryani masala, Fried onions, Mint, Saffron
instructions:
2 cup basmati rice wash kar ke 30 mins ke liye bhigo dein.

2 tbsp ghee mein 1 bay leaf, 2 tej patta, 2 elaichi, 1 dalchini, 4 cloves daal kar bhuno.

1 chopped onion, 1 tbsp ginger-garlic paste add karein, translucent hone tak bhuno.

1/2 cup chopped mixed vegetables (gajar, phoolgobhi, matar), 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp garam masala, salt.

1/4 cup yogurt dalein; mix karen.

1.5 cup paani dalein, rice add karein, aur 70% pakne tak cook karen.

Rice ko layers mein rakhkar dum pe rakh dein 20 mins ke liye.

Garama garam serve karein.

name: Chicken Biryani
ingredients: Chicken (200g), Basmati rice (100g), Yogurt, Biryani masala, Fried onions, Mint, Saffron
instructions:
Marinate 500g chicken with 1 cup yogurt, 1 tbsp ginger-garlic paste, 1 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp red chili powder, 1 tbsp garam masala, and salt. Keep for 1 hour.

Parboil 2 cups basmati rice till 70% cooked.

In heavy pan, sauté onions in oil till golden brown; add marinated chicken and cook till tender.

Layer cooked rice over chicken, add saffron soaked in warm milk and 2 tbsp ghee.

Cover tightly and cook on low heat (dum) for 25-30 minutes.

Garnish with fried onions and chopped coriander. Serve hot with raita.

name: Mutton Biryani
ingredients: Mutton (200g), Basmati rice (100g), Yogurt, Biryani masala, Fried onions, Mint, Saffron
instructions:
Marinate 500g mutton with 1 cup yogurt, 1 tbsp ginger-garlic paste, 1 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp red chili powder, 1 tbsp garam masala, and salt; marinate 1-2 hours.

Parboil 2 cups basmati rice to 70% done.

Cook marinated mutton till tender.

In a heavy pot, layer rice and mutton alternately; add saffron milk and ghee on top.

Cover tightly and cook on low heat (dum) for 30-40 minutes.

Serve hot with raita.

name: Jeera Rice
ingredients: Basmati rice (100g), Cumin seeds, Ghee, Salt, Water
instructions: 1. Heat ghee, add cumin seeds. 2. Add rice, saute briefly. 3. Add water, cook till done. Serve hot with dal or curry.

name: Lemon Rice
ingredients: Rice (100g), Lemon juice, Turmeric, Mustard seeds, Curry leaves, Peanuts, Oil
instructions: 1. Cook rice, cool. 2. Temper mustard seeds, curry leaves, turmeric. 3. Mix with rice, lemon juice, peanuts. Serve at room temperature.

name: Curd Rice
ingredients: Rice (100g), Curd/Yogurt (150ml), Cucumber, Carrot, Mustard seeds, Curry leaves, Green chili
instructions: 1. Cook rice, mash slightly. 2. Mix with curd. 3. Temper mustard, curry leaves. 4. Add chopped vegetables. Serve chilled.

name: Tamarind Rice
ingredients: Rice (100g), Tamarind paste, Jaggery, Peanuts, Sesame seeds, Turmeric, Red chili, Curry leaves
instructions: 1. Cook rice. 2. Prepare tamarind-jaggery paste. 3. Temper spices, peanuts. 4. Mix all, serve.

name: Fresh Fruit Salad
ingredients: Apple, Banana, Orange, Grapes, Pomegranate, Chaat masala, Lemon juice
instructions: 1. Chop all fruits. 2. Mix with chaat masala and lemon juice. 3. Serve chilled.

name: Fruit Custard
ingredients: Milk (200ml), Custard powder (2 tbsp), Sugar, Mixed fruits (apple, banana, grapes), Nuts
instructions: 1. Prepare custard with milk and custard powder. 2. Cool completely. 3. Add chopped fruits and nuts. Serve chilled.

name: Fruit Chaat
ingredients: Apple, Banana, Orange, Peanuts, Chaat masala, Lemon juice, Black salt
instructions: 1. Chop fruits. 2. Mix with peanuts, chaat masala, lemon juice, black salt. Serve fresh.

name: Veg Pasta in White Sauce
ingredients: Pasta (100g), Milk (150ml), Butter, Flour, Mixed vegetables, Garlic, Cheese, Italian herbs
instructions: 1. Boil pasta. 2. Prepare white sauce with butter, flour, milk. 3. Saute vegetables. 4. Mix pasta, sauce, vegetables. Top with cheese.

name: Red Sauce Pasta
ingredients: Pasta (100g), Tomatoes (200g), Garlic, Basil, Olive oil, Italian herbs, Parmesan
instructions: 1. Boil pasta. 2. Prepare tomato sauce with garlic, basil, herbs. 3. Toss pasta in sauce. Top with parmesan.

name: Vegan Pasta Primavera
ingredients: Pasta (100g), Broccoli, Bell peppers, Zucchini, Garlic, Olive oil, Herbs
instructions:
Cook 150g pasta till al dente; set aside.

Stir fry mixed veggies (bell peppers, zucchini, carrots) in 2 tbsp olive oil.

Add cooked pasta, 1/4 cup tomato sauce, basil, oregano.

Mix well; cook 2 mins.

Serve hot with vegan cheese topping.

name: Dahi Vada
ingredients: Urad dal (50g), Curd (200ml), Tamarind chutney, Green chutney, Cumin powder, Red chili
instructions:
Soak 1 cup urad dal overnight and grind to smooth batter.

Deep fry spoonfuls of batter till golden brown.

Soak fried vadas in warm water for 10 mins, then squeeze gently.

Dip in seasoned beaten yogurt.

Garnish with tamarind chutney, green chutney, roasted cumin powder, and red chili powder.

name: Raita (Mixed)
ingredients: Curd (150ml), Cucumber, Tomato, Onion, Cumin powder, Salt, Coriander
instructions: 1. Whisk curd. 2. Add chopped vegetables. 3. Season with cumin, salt. Garnish with coriander.

name: Boondi Raita
ingredients: Curd (150ml), Boondi (30g), Cumin powder, Red chili, Salt, Coriander
instructions:
Take 1 cup plain yogurt and whisk it until smooth.

Add salt to taste and 1/2 tsp roasted cumin powder. Mix well.

Soak 1/2 cup boondi (fried chickpea flour droplets) in warm water for 5 minutes, then drain excess water.

Add the soaked boondi to the yogurt mixture and stir gently.

Garnish with chopped fresh coriander leaves and a pinch of red chili powder if desired.

Serve chilled as a side dish with meals.

name: Sabudana Khichdi
ingredients: Sabudana (100g), Peanuts, Potato, Cumin seeds, Green chili, Curry leaves, Lemon juice
instructions: 1. Soak sabudana 4-5 hours. 2. Roast peanuts. 3. Temper cumin, add potato, sabudana. 4. Add peanuts, lemon juice. Serve hot.

name: Sabudana Vada
ingredients: Sabudana (100g), Potato (1), Peanuts, Green chili, Coriander, Cumin seeds, Salt
instructions: 1. Soak sabudana. 2. Mix with mashed potato, peanuts, spices. 3. Shape into vadas, deep fry. Serve with chutney.

name: Ragi Dosa
ingredients: Ragi flour (100g), Rice flour (50g), Onion, Green chili, Cumin seeds, Salt
instructions: 1. Mix flours with water to make batter. 2. Add onion, chili, cumin. 3. Spread on tawa, cook both sides. Serve with chutney.

name: Ragi Porridge
ingredients: Ragi flour (50g), Water/Milk, Jaggery, Cardamom
instructions: 1. Mix ragi flour with water/milk. 2. Cook on low heat, stirring. 3. Add jaggery, cardamom. Serve warm.

name: Chakli (Murukku)
ingredients: Rice flour (100g), Besan (50g), Sesame seeds, Cumin, Butter, Salt, Oil for frying
instructions:
Mix 1 cup rice flour, 1/2 cup gram flour, 1 tsp sesame seeds, 1/2 tsp asafoetida, 1 tsp red chili powder, and salt to taste.

Add 2 tbsp hot oil and mix well.

Slowly add warm water to make a soft dough.

Use chakli maker to shape spirals on a wax paper or directly into hot oil.

Deep fry in hot oil till golden brown and crispy. Drain excess oil and cool before serving.

name: Mathri
ingredients: Wheat flour (100g), Ajwain, Kalonji, Ghee, Salt, Oil for frying
instructions:
Mix 2 cups wheat flour, 1/2 cup semolina, 1 tsp ajwain, and salt to taste.

Add water little by little to form stiff dough.

Roll dough thin and cut into small shapes or diamonds.

Deep fry in hot oil till golden and crisp.

Cool completely before serving.

name: Sev (Besan)
ingredients: Besan (100g), Turmeric, Red chili, Ajwain, Salt, Oil for frying
instructions: 1. Make batter with besan, spices, water. 2. Use sev maker to fry. 3. Cool and store in airtight container.

ingredients: Oats (100g), Wheat flour (50g), Butter, Sugar, Baking powder
instructions: 1. Mix oats, flour, butter, sugar, baking powder. 2. Shape into biscuits. 3. Bake at 180Â°C for 15-20 mins.

name: Masala Chai
ingredients: Tea leaves, Milk (100ml), Water, Sugar, Ginger, Cardamom, Cloves
instructions: 1. Boil water with tea, ginger, cardamom, cloves. 2. Add milk, sugar. 3. Strain and serve hot.

name: Filter Coffee
ingredients: Coffee powder, Milk (100ml), Sugar, Water
instructions: 1. Brew coffee in filter. 2. Mix decoction with hot milk, sugar. 3. Serve hot or cold.

name: Turmeric Milk (Haldi Doodh)
ingredients: Milk (200ml), Turmeric powder, Black pepper, Honey/Sugar
instructions: 1. Heat milk with turmeric, pepper. 2. Add honey/sugar. 3. Serve warm before bed.

name: Sweet Lassi
ingredients: Curd (150ml), Sugar, Cardamom, Water, Ice
instructions: 1. Blend curd, sugar, cardamom, water, ice. 2. Serve chilled.

name: Mango Lassi
ingredients: Curd (150ml), Mango pulp (100g), Sugar, Cardamom, Ice
instructions: 1. Blend curd, mango pulp, sugar, cardamom, ice. 2. Serve chilled.

name: Badam Milk
ingredients: Milk (200ml), Almonds (10), Sugar, Cardamom, Saffron
instructions: 1. Soak almonds, peel, grind to paste. 2. Heat milk with almond paste, sugar, cardamom, saffron. 3. Serve hot or cold.
